title: Dollar Dashboard
description: Created a SPA for financial management with responsive UI and RESTful APIs using Node.js and MongoDB.

title: WordWise
description: Developed 'WordWise' using SwiftUI and Firebase, achieving a 10% vocabulary improvement in trials.

title: UberClone
description: Built a ride-sharing app with React Native and Google Maps API, enabling GPS-based fare estimation.

title: Impact of Sentiment on Cryptocurrency Prices
description: Predicted cryptocurrency prices using machine learning models and FinBERT sentiment analysis.

title: WavePortal
description: Developed a site engaging users with an Ethereum smart contract, processing over 150 messages.

title: Vickery Auction
description: Deployed a blockchain auction platform using NFTs and ERC20 tokens, with a React-based UI.
